tasks.task_description: Create project directory structure with Vite React TypeScript template
Set up basic project dependencies (React, TypeScript, mapping library, UI components)
Create mock GeoJSON data for First Nations boundaries around Cairns
Create mock health services data with locations and details
Implement responsive map component centered on Cairns with geolocation support
Add First Nations boundary overlays to the map
Create health services detail page with modal/overlay interface
Build resource request form with mock submission
Write TODO.md file to project directory

description: Build responsive web-based mobile app for First Nations Country boundaries and health services in Cairns area
context: Vite React TypeScript project already exists in health-team-project directory with basic structure and dependencies installed
Installed Leaflet mapping library and React-Leaflet components with TypeScript types
Created mock GeoJSON data for First Nations boundaries around Cairns with 4 territories: Yidinji, Gimuy Walubara Yidinji, Djabugay, and Buluwai
Created mock health services data with 8 services including Western hospitals, Aboriginal community health services, and traditional healing centres
Implemented responsive map component with geolocation, First Nations boundaries, health services markers, service detail modal, resource request form, and comprehensive mobile-responsive CSS styling
Created comprehensive TODO.md file documenting the completed project plan, implementation details, and next steps for production
